# T-003: Implement Feature

| Field | Value |

| Priority | Should Have |

## Goal
Implement the core feature logic that depends on project setup and config loading.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Feature handles error cases gracefully
- [ ] Unit tests achieve 90%+ coverage
